message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but that price is a bit high for me. Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
I understand, $100 is fair, but I'm trying to stick to a tight budget.  How about we meet in the middle at $95?
I see you're a savvy negotiator, Bob! I can do $105, but I'm not sure I'm comfortable going any higher than that. It's a great product, but I have to think about my own bottom line.
